Name: Elderflower Martini No.2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry but not bone dry with aromatic hints of grass and elderflower.
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Martini No.2 contains 203 calories
